settings.text: At MUD Jeans we offer a unique leasing system. You can lease your jeans for a small monthly fee, then – after a year – you can either return them, swap for a fresh pair, or keep them – it’s your choice. And no matter what option you choose, we're here for free repairs, if you need them. We will gratefully take your old jeans back at the end of use and recycle them into brand new jeans.

While you pay a monthly fee for 12 months and enjoy wearing the jeans, we remain the owners of the raw materials. After 12 months the jeans are yours and the payments stop automatically. You can decide to keep the jeans (for free), swap them for a fresh pair, or return them for recycling (for free, obviously). With our lease system we aim to maximise the use of our jeans, avoiding the materials to go to landfill, but keeping them in our closed loop recycle system.

settings.heading: Step 1
settings.text: Choose your MUD Jeans and get a discount by sending us an old jeans.

settings.heading: Step 2
settings.text: Start leasing a MUD! Starting as low as €10,80 a month.

settings.heading: Step 3
settings.text: After 12 months of leasing your jeans are fully paid!

settings.heading: Step 4
settings.text: After end of your lease period, you can keep your jeans or swap them for a new pair!

settings.testimonial: I dared to lease jeans for the first time and am really convinced of the quality.As normal jeans tend to break after a year or so, this was a good option for me. The MUD Jeans did not break.
settings.author: Stephanie E.

settings.testimonial: Love that I can return a pair of old jeans and that they will be used to make some new jeans. And bonus is the discount on my new (lease) jeans!
settings.author: Tanja

settings.testimonial: I have 3 pairs of MUD Jeans, love the fit. Opted to lease, knowing that I can return the jeans for recycling when I'm ready for a new style, great.Jeans for life!
settings.author: Jonathan

settings.testimonial: These jeans are my go to outdoors jeans! They fit perfectly, I even bought them online without trying on for the first time. Leased them (returned my worn out leased pair as well ;)
settings.author: Marit V.

settings.text: Just click on 'Lease now' button of your favorite style.

settings.title: Do I have to keep paying after 12 months?
settings.answer: No, you don't have to keep paying after 12 months and as a matter of fact, the payments will automatically stop after this period! Your jeans have been paid off and they are yours to keep... Until you decide to send them back to us for recycling.

settings.title: What makes leasing different from buying?
settings.answer: Simply put: leasing means paying a small monthly fee over the course of one year instead of a larger amount all in one go. For us, this is a fantastic way to ensure we get back our raw materials once your jeans are worn out, in order to create new jeans out of them. The financial incentive for you: your following leases will be cheaper. You will get a 10% discount on your next lease that both you, your family and your friends can also enjoy!

settings.title: Can I change the jeans throughout the lease?
settings.answer: No, you have to lease the jeans for a consecutive 12 month-period. After that, the payments stop and you can keep the jeans for as long as you'd like (the longer, the better for our planet). However, you can decide to lease a 2nd or 3rd pair of jeans during or at the end of your first lease at a 10% discount! If you want to do this at the end of your leasing period, you can swap your jeans for a new pair and start the leasing process over again.

settings.title: What is a family discount?
settings.answer: Once you have become a member of our leasing MUD fam', we would love for you to spread the circular word. So, your family members and friends have a special offer... They can start leasing a pair of jeans on your account at a 10% monthly discount!

settings.title: Subscribe to our newsletter
settings.subheading: Be the first to get exclusive deals, new denim drops, and latest circular fashion insights—straight to your inbox.
